tickets.title: Printer not connecting to Wi-Fi network
tickets.description: The office printer keeps disconnecting from Wi-Fi after restart.

tickets.title: Request for new projector cable
tickets.description: Conference room projector cable is broken and needs replacement.

tickets.title: Website footer alignment issue on mobile view
tickets.description: Footer text overlaps social media icons on smaller screens.

tickets.title: Email synchronization problem in Outlook
tickets.description: Outlook app fails to sync new emails since last update.

tickets.title: Unable to access internal HR portal
tickets.description: Login page for HR portal shows an authentication error.

tickets.title: Request to upgrade team laptops to Windows 11
tickets.description: Team requests OS upgrade for better security and features.

tickets.title: Slow response from accounting software
tickets.description: Accounting app takes too long to load reports and dashboards.

tickets.title: Air conditioning not working in server room
tickets.description: Temperature rising above normal levels; needs urgent check.

tickets.title: Request for additional storage on shared drive
tickets.description: Shared drive space nearly full, causing file upload failures.

tickets.title: Intermittent network connectivity on 2nd floor
tickets.description: Wi-Fi signal drops frequently during video calls and uploads.
